description:
Added a bass track in standard tuning in response of the latter complaint. 
The song is in D# tuning. That's their tuning. Everywhere says so. Source in comment.
Moreover, the live video shows Keuning playing the chord shapes as I had transcribed. 
Oh, and the bass appears to be in D# too here. Stoermer plays the 1st fret when the chord is E.
title: When You Were Young

description: Undo previous update to dropped D#. There is no need to detune on bass.
title: When You Were Young

description:
- Changed to Killers' Tuning. And then the whole guitar tracks
- Condensed said tracks
- Adjusted bass accordingly
- Minor drum adjustments
- Added missing notes and chords in keys
- Added chord names
- Added track names
- Added a vocal track
- Added lyrics
title: When You Were Young

description: As suggested, instead of playing B on the 7th fret of the E String, play it on the 2nd fret of the A string.
title: When You Were Young

description: This song is not played in half step down. It is in Drop D. Edited the whole song to fit the way the band actually plays it
title: When You Were Young
